titleInfo.title: Industrial robot learns visuo-motor coordination by means of the "neural-gas" network
Proceedings of the 1991 International Conference on Artificial Neural Networks (ICANN-91), Espoo, Finland, 24 - 28 June, 1991

bibliographicCitation.wels: Walter, J. A.; Martinetz, T.; Schulten, K. (1991): Industrial robot learns visuo-motor coordination by means of the "neural-gas" network. In: Teuvo Kohonen; Kai Makisara; Olli Simula; Jari Kangas (Hrsg.): Proceedings of the 1991 International Conference on Artificial Neural Networks (ICANN-91), Espoo, Finland, 24 - 28 June, 1991. Amsterdam: North Holland. S. 357-364.
